basic.description: This course provides engineering physics students with a complete experience in advanced design and implementation. Working in groups, students undertake a large design project of their choice that reflects and further develops their knowledge of physics and engineering design. The students then build a prototype of their design to demonstrate the feasibility of project within the design constraints.
basic.subject: ENPH
basic.title: Advanced Engineering Physics Design Project

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites: ENPH 344 or PHYS 344 & ENPH 351 OR ENPH 354
Exclusions: ENPH OR PHYS 450
